content.title: Raynaud Phenomenon
content.definition: Episodic digital vasospasm with color changes (white-blue-red) triggered by cold or stress.
content.statement: Raynaud Phenomenon is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Raynaud that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Raynaud Phenomenon helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Raynaud Phenomenon include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of Raynaud Phenomenon.

citations.source: Harrison's Principles of Internal Medicine, 21st ed. McGraw-Hill.
